00028 #include <string.h>

00044 /* extracts the thumbnail from between the 'REND' and the 'GLOB'
00045  * chunks of the header, don't use typical blend loader because its too slow */
00046 
00047 static ImBuf *loadblend_thumb(gzFile gzfile)
00048 {
00049     char buf[12];
00050     int bhead[24/sizeof(int)]; /* max size on 64bit */
00051     char endian, pointer_size;
00052     char endian_switch;
00053     int sizeof_bhead;
00054 
00055     /* read the blend file header */
00056     if (gzread(gzfile, buf, 12) != 12)
00057         return NULL;
00058     if (strncmp(buf, "BLENDER", 7))
00059         return NULL;
00060 
00061     if (buf[7]=='-')
00062         pointer_size= 8;
00063     else if (buf[7]=='_')
00064         pointer_size= 4;
00065     else
00066         return NULL;
00067 
00068     sizeof_bhead = 16 + pointer_size;
00069 
00070     if (buf[8]=='V')
00071         endian= B_ENDIAN; /* big: PPC */
00072     else if (buf[8]=='v')
00073         endian= L_ENDIAN; /* little: x86 */
00074     else
00075         return NULL;
00076 
00077     endian_switch = ((ENDIAN_ORDER != endian)) ? 1 : 0;
00078 
00079     while (gzread(gzfile, bhead, sizeof_bhead) == sizeof_bhead) {
00080         if (endian_switch)
00081             SWITCH_INT(bhead[1]); /* length */
00082 
00083         if (bhead[0]==REND) {
00084             gzseek(gzfile, bhead[1], SEEK_CUR); /* skip to the next */
00085         }
00086         else {
00087             break;
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091     /* using 'TEST' since new names segfault when loading in old blenders */
00092     if (bhead[0] == TEST) {
00093         ImBuf *img= NULL;
00094         int size[2];
00095 
00096         if (gzread(gzfile, size, sizeof(size)) != sizeof(size))
00097             return NULL;
00098 
00099         if (endian_switch) {
00100             SWITCH_INT(size[0]);
00101             SWITCH_INT(size[1]);
00102         }
00103         /* length */
00104         bhead[1] -= sizeof(int) * 2;
00105 
00106         /* inconsistent image size, quit early */
00107         if (bhead[1] != size[0] * size[1] * sizeof(int))
00108             return NULL;
00109     
00110         /* finally malloc and read the data */
00111         img= IMB_allocImBuf(size[0], size[1], 32, IB_rect | IB_metadata);
00112     
00113         if (gzread(gzfile, img->rect, bhead[1]) != bhead[1]) {
00114             IMB_freeImBuf(img);
00115             img= NULL;
00116         }
00117     
00118         return img;
00119     }
00120     
00121     return NULL;
00122 }
00123 
00124 ImBuf *IMB_loadblend_thumb(const char *path)
00125 {
00126     gzFile gzfile;
00127     /* not necessarily a gzip */
00128     gzfile = BLI_gzopen(path, "rb");
00129 
00130     if (NULL == gzfile ) {
00131         return NULL;
00132     }
00133     else {
00134         ImBuf *img= loadblend_thumb(gzfile);
00135 
00136         /* read ok! */
00137         gzclose(gzfile);
00138 
00139         return img;
00140     }
00141 }

00143 /* add a fake passepartout overlay to a byte buffer, use for blend file thumbnails */
00144 #define MARGIN 2
00145 
00146 void IMB_overlayblend_thumb(unsigned int *thumb, int width, int height, float aspect)
00147 {
00148     unsigned char *px= (unsigned char *)thumb;
00149     int margin_l = MARGIN;
00150     int margin_b = MARGIN;
00151     int margin_r = width - MARGIN;
00152     int margin_t = height - MARGIN;
00153 
00154     if (aspect < 1.0f) {
00155         margin_l= (int)((width - ((float)width * aspect)) / 2.0f);
00156         margin_l += MARGIN;
00157         CLAMP(margin_l, MARGIN, (width/2));
00158         margin_r = width - margin_l;
00159     }
00160     else if (aspect > 1.0f) {
00161         margin_b= (int)((height - ((float)height / aspect)) / 2.0f);
00162         margin_b += MARGIN;
00163         CLAMP(margin_b, MARGIN, (height/2));
00164         margin_t = height - margin_b;
00165     }
00166 
00167     {   
00168         int x, y;
00169         int stride_x= (margin_r - margin_l) - 2;
00170         
00171         for (y=0; y < height; y++) {
00172             for (x=0; x < width; x++, px+=4) {
00173                 int hline= 0, vline= 0;
00174                 if ((x > margin_l && x < margin_r) && (y > margin_b && y < margin_t)) {
00175                     /* interior. skip */
00176                     x  += stride_x;
00177                     px += stride_x * 4;
00178                 }
00179                 else if ((hline=(((x == margin_l || x == margin_r)) && y >= margin_b && y <= margin_t)) ||
00180                         (vline=(((y == margin_b || y == margin_t)) && x >= margin_l && x <= margin_r)))
00181                 {
00182                     /* dashed line */
00183                     if ((hline && y % 2) || (vline && x % 2)) {
00184                         px[0]= px[1]= px[2]= 0;
00185                         px[3] = 255;
00186                     }
00187                 }
00188                 else {
00189                     /* outside, fill in alpha, like passepartout */
00190                     px[0] *= 0.5f;
00191                     px[1] *= 0.5f;
00192                     px[2] *= 0.5f;
00193                     px[3] = (px[3] * 0.5f) + 96;
00194                 }
00195             }
00196         }
00197     }
00198 }
